post.text: We've made extraordinary progress under President Obama. On November 8, that progress is on the ballot.

comment.author: Justin
comment.text: Well I'm going through this feed it supposed to be Hillary's page and it's full of people bad-mouthing Hillary and yet they're still trying to say Hillary is winning what a joke

replies.author: Audrey
replies.text: The Trump Trolls won't go down quietly. His lies feed his supporters full of BS. You one, too?

replies.author: Justin
replies.text: Your probably one of those that didn't do any research. Just what you seen on fb

replies.author: Justin
replies.text: Oh nevermind I see you're a troll your Facebook page isn't even a real person

replies.author: Zachari
replies.text: Why are all of the Trump trolls so interested in getting on Hillary's page? Go over to Dumb Donalds page.

replies.author: Justin
replies.text: I actually just came to read valid points... something logical but i couldn't find any.
